name: Virtual Tank
description:
Virtual Tank is a 2D Tank Fighting game, programmed in Unity, where the objective is to defeat the different enemies you stumble upon, having in mind your mission: You want to defeat MasterServices. They kiled Felix Radda's (our protagonist's) mother, and are responsible for major damage in society. Make sure to defeat their CEO Maxis in the 3rd layer of Virtual Reality in which things may get complicated for "real".

Virtual Tank is actually an University project developed by 4 1st year degree ENTI students, located in Barcelona.
